mean_en: to compare two things in order to show the differences between them; to show a clear difference when close together or when compared
sentence: There\u0027s a striking contrast between his portrayals of two different characters.
sentence_trans: 他扮演的两个不同的角色很有反差感。
word_etyma: contra相反 + st站 → 站在对立面 → contrast对比
